title: Corda Reconciliation Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the reconciliation subsection.

permissionSummaryIntervalMs.description: Interval in ms between permission summary reconciliation rounds.

cpkWriteIntervalMs.description: Interval in ms between updating Kafka with missing CPKs compared to CPKs existing in the DB.

cpiInfoIntervalMs.description: Interval in ms between updating Kafka with missing CPI metadata compared to CPI metadata existing in the DB.

vnodeInfoIntervalMs.description: Interval in ms between updating Kafka with missing CPI metadata compared to CPI metadata existing in the DB.

configIntervalMs.description: Interval in ms between updating Kafka with missing Configuration sections compared to Configuration sections existing in the DB.
